Detailed Description

Has a list of groups (does not own them), treats each neuron within each group, group after group.

This class has a protected constructor, and shall only be called by OutputterImpl. The method iterate is called by the OutputManager, which calls the operation passed in operation_function then. Derives from DataRecordNeuronVisitor to be able to retrieve the spike list from neurons. It is a friend of the Group class.
